title: Salmon and watercress pots
ingredients: ['250 g (8½ oz) piece of salmon fillet', '1 bay leaf', '2–3 onion slices', '5 black peppercorns', '200 g (7 oz) smoked salmon slices', '200 g (7 oz) fromage frais', '3 tbsp crème fraîche', 'finely grated zest of ½ lemon', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tsp horseradish sauce', '4 tbsp chopped fresh watercress', 'salt and pepper', 'Watercress salad', '2 tbsp orange juice', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', '½ tsp clear honey', '100 g (3½ oz) watercress leaves']
